description:
Indulge in the Irish coffee-scented blend of oils, waxes, and corrosion inhibitors in this lube. Expect a super-smooth and whisper-quiet chain even in the wettest, muddiest riding conditions.

  • Rounded applicator cap effortlessly glides over the chain during application
  • Crafted with a readily biodegradable blend of oils, waxes, and corrosion inhibitors
  • Engineered for endurance in the most extreme, filthy riding conditions
  • Suitable for road, MTB and cyclocross bikes
name: Peaty's Wet Link Lube 120ml
